    HasDerivAt (Function.update x i) (Pi.single i (1 : 𝕜)) y := by

⊢ Eq (deriv (Function.update x i) y) (Pi.single i 1)
decl:
theorem deriv_update (x : ι → 𝕜) (i : ι) (y : 𝕜) :
    deriv (Function.update x i) y = Pi.single i (1 : 𝕜) :=
